CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnSyncProperty
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if _UserService.LocalPlayer ~= self.Entity then return end
if name == "CharacterMoney" then local MoneyInfo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/InventoryUI/Inventory/InventoryPanel/CoinPanel/coin_count") MoneyInfo.TextComponent.Text = math.floor(self.CharacterMoney) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: EarnMoney
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if self.CharacterMoney + Charge >= 0 then self.CharacterMoney = self.CharacterMoney + Charge return true else log("돈이 부족합니다.") return false end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: DisableAllUI
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local DestinationInfo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DestinationInfoUI/DestinationInfo") local Inventory = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/InventoryUI/Inventory") local SkillInfo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SkillUI/SkillInfo") local CharacterUpgradeInfo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/CharacterUpgradeUI/CharacterUpgradeInfo")
Inventory:SetVisible(false) Inventory:SetEnable(false)
if DestinationInfo.Visible == true then DestinationInfo.DestinationUIManager:SetUI(false) end
if SkillInfo.Visible == true then SkillInfo.SkillUIManager:SetUI(false) end
if CharacterUpgradeInfo.Visible == true then CharacterUpgradeInfo.CharacterUpgradeUIManager:SetUI(false) end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local key = event.key --------------------------------------------------------
if self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer then return end
if key == KeyboardKey.I then local Inventory = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/InventoryUI/Inventory")
if Inventory.Visible == false then self:DisableAllUI() Inventory:SetVisible(true) Inventory:SetEnable(true) else Inventory:SetVisible(false) Inventory:SetVisible(false) end end
